data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy S7 edge (SM-G935F), Android Nougat 7.0
data.actual_result: The users are unselected when changing the display orientation
data.short_description: Changing display orientation when creating a new group DM removes the selected users
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Friends and click the chat icon in top right corner - Select one or more friends to invite to the group DM - Switch to landscape mode (or to portrait mode if you are in landscape) - Notice that all selected users were removed
